body:
> As for current solution, it just check if service has been registered to `at least one` registries.
> 
> But, while some of the registries, this method will directly return `true`.
> 
> My question is whether we should provide a state like `none of the registries has been registered`, `some ( or how many ) of the registries has been registered` and `all of the registries has been registered`.

In my opinion, service only needs to be registered in a registry, and consumers can call it. We do not need to display the detailed registration information of the provider in the qos list. do you think so ?
LGTM

Thanks for the contribution. We received bug reports with computeIfAbsent refactoring on ExtensionLoader before because of the JDK 1.8 implementation flaw and have reverted it back. 

After that, we've decided not to accept patches to ExtensionLoader if not for bugfix or feature reasons.

请问下自动注册代码在哪？
DubboRegistry的构造器里的定时任务？

```
com.alibaba.nacos.client.naming.NacosNamingService#registerInstance(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.alibaba.nacos.api.naming.pojo.Instance)
```
这个方法中，有个beatReactor.addBeatInfo();会定时给nacos-server发心跳。如果服务端没有实例的话，会重新注册该实例。
nacos 通过心跳续约，网络恢复后通过心跳会重新注册服务
建议先使用延迟暴露功能满足你的需求，参考下文档 [延迟暴露](https://dubbo.apache.org/zh/docs/v2.7/user/examples/delay-publish/)
thanks

@chickenlj When the queue parameter is less than 0, how about throwing an exception directly, or setting a default queue size

> @chickenlj When the queue parameter is less than 0, how about throwing an exception directly, or setting a default queue size

Or use synchronous queue

I don't think this is a problem. 
You can find similar code in `Executors.newFixedThreadPool()`, also we'll set queue default to 0 and use SynchronousQueue if user is not specify the parameter. 
You should set queue to a positive number if you want a bounded queue. And if you set this parameter to a negative number, you should know exactly what you are doing.

@kevinw66  Alibaba java development manual clearly points out that the reason why the thread pool provided by JDK can not be used is that it may cause oom. I think it should also be observed here. There is an old Chinese saying that "a gentleman does not stand under a dangerous wall". If I do not give a default size, the online environment may receive requests unlimited until oom

> Alibaba java development manual clearly points out that the reason why the thread pool provided by JDK can not be used is that it may cause oom.

Agreed, and that's why we add `queue` parameter here to let user to choose which way they want to use, and set it default to 0 to use SynchronousQueue to prevent this situation if the user did not set value or didn't know the meaning of this parameter.
But we also keep the unbounded queue to let user choose if they do want to use, to meets all requirements.
@kevinw66  If it's to meet all the requirements, why can't workqueue be created by users themselves?

@kevinw66   Sorry, I just reviewed the source code carefully. You can use Dubo's extensionloader to extend and implement the ThreadPool interface to define the thread pool. However, I still think that there should be no oom risk in the default implementation here. Even if the user has different requirements, he can implement the ThreadPool interface to define the thread pool himself

nacos-client 1.4.1 移除了这个类 HttpSimpleClient.java 

nacos-client 1.3.2    1.3.3   1.4.0    HttpAgent.httpGet  方法参数与 dubbo 2.7.10 使用的不兼容。

不兼容代码如下： NacosDynamicConfiguration.java  271 行
```
HttpSimpleClient.HttpResult result = httpAgent.httpGet(GET_CONFIG_KEYS_PATH, emptyList(), paramsValues, encoding, 5 * 1000);
            Stream<String> keysStream = toKeysStream(result.content);
```
确实，这个是因为agent用了nacos-client的`HttpAgent`类，nacos不同版本这个接口返回值类型也不同，贸然升级版本的话有些用低版本的nacos-client的工程也会出问题。这边你先试试使用dubbo引入的1.3.1版本的nacos-client看看是否会出问题呢？
